title: Applications now being accepted for 2022 Urban Heat Island Mapping Campaigns
content:
The urban heat island bakes Phoenix. Credit: NOAA CPO

The urban heat island bakes Phoenix. Credit: NOAA CPO The National Integrated Heat Health Information System (NIHHIS) and CAPA Strategies are now accepting applications from organizations interested in participating in the 2022 cohort of the Urban Heat Island (UHI) mapping campaigns. Over the past four years, more than three dozen cities across the United States. have participated in the UHI campaign program to map the hottest parts of their communities. Cities in 11 states participated in the 2021 campaign, which finished data collection in September. Mapping reports will be released on a rolling basis through December. Read more at the link below.
